text:
Today you'll be playing a game that involves making a series of decisions on slot machines. Your goal in the game is to earn as much money as possible, as the amount of money you earn will determine how much money you will receive in bonus payment at the end of the game.

Note: Please use only the navigation buttons provided to you, and do not use your browser navigation buttons or refresh the page. Using the browser 'Back' or 'Forward' buttons or refreshing the page will lead to your results not being saved. Thank you for your cooperation!
The game will involve a series of rounds with 3 different slot machines.
On each round, you will first press the red button, which will pair you with the slot machine you are playing with on that round.

After you have been paired with a slot machine on that round, you will be asked to decide how much of $1.00 you would like to bet and how much to keep for yourself.

Using the slider scale provided, you can decide how much of $1.00 to bet in $0.10 increments.

However, you must make a minimum bet of $0.10, so $0 is not an option.

Otherwise, feel free to bet as much or as little as you would like.
After you decide how much of the $1.00 you want to bet, your bet will be quadrupled (x4)!
The slot machine will either keep all the money or give you back some portion of it.

To recap, on each round of this game you will first press the red button and you will be paired with one of 3 slot machines.

You will then decide how much of $1.00 you would like to bet and how much to keep for yourself, keeping in mind that $0 is not an option.

Whatever money you decide to bet will then be quadrupled (x4).

The slot machine will then either keep all the money or give you back some portion of it.

After the slot machine receives your bet, you will be notified of the outcome on that round.

You will then push the button again to play with another slot machine.
At the end of the game, we will randomly select two of your rounds to determine your bonus payment, so the best strategy is to try to win as much money as possible on each round.

The game will probably take you 30 minutes. If you do not have 30 minutes to complete this task, please exit now and do not proceed.

If you would like to play this game, please proceed to answer the quiz questions correctly in order to enter the game.

If you are still unsure about the task instructions, please use the 'back' button to review the instructions. Failure to answer all quiz questions correctly will result in the termination of the session.
